GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.15.45
GSD.description:
KVM: x86: avoid calling x86 emulator without a decoded instruction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.45 by commit 531d1070d864c78283b7597449e60ddc53319d88, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 4aa2691dcbd38ce1c461188799d863398dd2865d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: KVM: x86: avoid calling x86 emulator without a decoded instruction
